entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Key Status in MAUI Desktop #9764
  • MenuBar/MenubarItem does not bind to commands #9762
  • Shell flyout does not update when item selected from shell tab #9761
  • Polyline - Fill Not Working on Triangle or Any Shape #9759
  • VisualStates are not being applied to items in a CollectionView using DataTemplates in Release Mode #9756
  • APT2259 Incompatible with Attribute Resource (attr) Reference is not Verbose #9755
  • Setting 'CanExecute' doesn't change the status of Button controls when they are bound to MVVM Commands #9753
  • Cant Update MenuBarItem Height (<Shell.MenuBarItems>) #9752
  • Shell navigation not called and updated for top tabs #9750
  • Changing CarouselView Position has no effect until it is set >0 and back to 0 when loop is disabled #9749
  • Preferences.Get() returns default type value instead of defaultValue parameter value #9748
  • Path resouces cannot be consumed multiple times via StaticResource #9747
  • Add or publicly document msbuild variable to control XAML Hot Reload tooling #9745
  • CarouselView displaying views through DataTemplate throws exception when loop is enabled #9744
  • [Android] Content wrapped in NavigationPage objects in Tabbed Page dissapears after tabs navigating #9743
  • Canvas background on iOS isn't transparent #9740
  • .NET MAUI - Picker.ItemsSource does not update the picker after being manually set. #9739
  • Title Bar Main 3 buttons don't work as expected #9737
  • Can't Change Shell FlyoutBackgroundColor From a Theme Style File...again #9736
  • Button with image not scaling to HeightRequest on iOS and Android #9734

Closed

  • Binding to WebView.Source with empty string causing blank screen on Android #9751
  • Splash screen on Samsung S20 Android 12 #7645
  • Button/ImageButton has space between button and border in its corner #7128
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Top Navigation Menu bar does not show up on MAUIBlazor deployed to iPhone with iOS 15.6 #9693
  • MAUI Razor Component CSS not compiling on iOS local device (iPhone) #9723
  • Using a custom configuration to publish Android app #9627
    Backlog
  • Hostname not verified when sending request on Android #8518
  • HttpClientHandler ClientCertificate property is null on Android #8860
  • Native Crash when BindingContext is used on iOS Simulator #9683
  • Can't deploy my application #9711
  • 运行第一个demo时报错 #9732
  • 运行第一个demo时报错 #9733
  • [Windows] project path containing substed drives causes DEP0700 (AppxManifest.xml not found) during launch of desktop app - android is OK #9611
  • [Windows] HTML select options are not properly displayed in WebView #9579
  • Machine hangs while building a .NET MAUI App - Observed even in a basic project created from the template #9652

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Fix Shadow rendering on iOS Border (#8464)" #9760
    area/controls 🎮
  • Build the net6 templates in net7 #9758
  • Try fix API docs #9757
    area/docs 📓
  • Update docs animations #9746
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Update Rollback.in.json #9763
  • [ci] Add support to net7.0 for multi-targeting in VS #9643
  • [xamlc] fix compiled {OnPlatform} #9205
    area/Xaml </>, 6.0-servicing
  • [Windows] Fix default corner radius on Button #9515
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Bump BenchmarkDotNet from 0.13.1 to 0.13.2 #9741
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22419.4 to 7.0.0-preview1.22426.2 #9742
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9705
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Tizen] Update MauiPicker.cs #9735
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-picker
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.1 to 4.13.2.2 #9317
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22418.3 to 7.0.0-preview1.22419.4 #9577
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add Maui project capability for development #9695
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • Implement SkiaImage Save #9125
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Housekeeping] Including pending fixes from Xamarin.Forms SRs #8702
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • 1100-Enhancement-DatePicker-supports-nullable-(Selected)-Date #9727
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Fix format #9600
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Allow custom layout managers for existing layout types in Controls #9470
    area/layout 🔲
  • Update SkiaSharp to the new stable #9508
    area/single project ☝️, area/drawing ✏️, 7.0-rc1
  • Update SkiaSharp to the new stable #9509
    area/single project ☝️, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-sr5
  • [Windows] Fix Entry placeholder position using VerticalTextAlignment #8684
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • [Windows] Align Button VisualStates behavior with other platforms #8347
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0-servicing
  • Copy MAUI to bin when SelfContained=False #8285
    platform/windows 🪟, area/publishing 🏁, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Fix crash using ContentViews inside CollectionView #8051
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, 6.0-servicing
  • [Catalyst] Fix brushes in Frame #7925
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-servicing
  • Preserve the correct binding context for menu items #7358
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0-servicing
  • [Housekeeping] Added new Border samples to the Gallery #9676
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
